Package HMS.src.io

Class BaseCsvHelper

java.lang.Object
HMS.src.io.BaseCsvHelper
Direct Known Subclasses:
AppointmentCsvHelper, ApptCsvHelper, AvailabilityCsvHelper, MedicalRecordCsvHelper, MedicationCsvHelper, PasswordCsvHelper, PatientCsvHelper, PrescriptionCsvHelper, ReplReqCsvHelper, StaffCsvHelper
public abstract class BaseCsvHelper extends Object
Base class for CSV handling, providing common functionalities to all CSV helpers.

  • Method Details

    • getFileName

      protected abstract String getFileName()
      Each subclass should implement this to return the specific file name it manages.
      Returns:
      The file name of the specific CSV file.

    • getFilePath

      public String getFilePath()
      Gets the complete file path for the CSV file managed by this helper. This method can be overridden by subclasses to specify different file paths.
      Returns:
      String representing the full file path.

    • readEntries

      public List<String[]> readEntries()
      Reads the CSV file and returns a list of string arrays, each representing a row from the CSV file.
      Returns:
      A List containing string arrays, each representing a row from the CSV file.

      public String[] getEntryById(String id)
      Gets an entry from the CSV file by ID.

    • getEntriesByFilter

      public List<String[]> getEntriesByFilter(BaseCsvHelper.Filter<String[]> filter)
      Gets all entries from the CSV file.

      A list of string arrays, each representing a row from the CSV file.
